explains: adj. 橡胶似的；有弹力的；坚韧的

sentences.en: The eggs were overcooked and rubbery.
sentences.cn: 鸡蛋煮得太老了，像胶皮似的。

sentences.en: The mask is left on for about 15 minutes while it sets to a rubbery texture.
sentences.cn: 大约用了15分钟，面具变成了一种橡胶组织。

sentences.en: I do not recommend fat-free dairy products, particularly cheese, instead of getting creamy and bubbly in recipes, it can turn rubbery and tasteless.
sentences.cn: 我不推荐脱脂的乳制品，尤其是奶酪，配方中没有奶油味和气泡味，它变得像橡胶，没滋没味。
